Everything about this place is unique and welcoming - the decor, the staff, the seating, the food!  Large menu with tons of delicious options. I've never seen a place like this...ever. It's definitely one of a kind. Whoever designed it was creatively brilliant. Super kid and family friendly. This place was designed with kids in mind in a very tasteful way. Games and toys are spread out downstairs for kiddos to play while adults enjoy their delicious meal.
